messages.subject: pratchett fans
messages.msgSnippet: Tracy I simply cannot get into Pratchett. But he is my current hero. I have 4 sons aged 19, 16, 13, 10. Sons19, 16 & 10 are big time Pratchett fans. Son13 only
messages.messageBody:
Tracy

I simply cannot get into Pratchett. But he is my current hero. I have 4 sons
aged 19, 16, 13, 10. Sons19, 16 & 10 are big time Pratchett fans. Son13 only
learnt to read a few months before he turned 12 and has continued to really
dislike reading, and found it hard going. Last night I found him - with VERY
muddy feet - curled up in our waterbed with a Terry
Pratchett book. This morning he spent another hour reading the book. I am so
rapt!

Tracy Oldfield wrote:

> Naw, was looking for fellow Pratchett fans...
